item.title: Chapter title: I am the gate
item.description: < Previous | Contents ‌Chapter title: I am the gate‌ 14 June 1971 pm in Bombay, India Archive code: 7106145 ShortTitle: GATE08 Audio: Yes Video: No Question 1 BELOVED MASTER, THEOSOPHISTS HAVE TALKED ABOUT DIFFERENT GROUPS OF MASTERS EXISTING PHYSICALLY OR EVEN NON-PHYSICALLY. HOW MANY OF THESE GROUPS EXIST TODAY? WHAT ARE THESE ESOTERIC GROUPS, AND HOW DO THEY INFLUENCE SEEKERS AND THE WORLD'S ACTIVITY? PLEASE TELL US ABOUT YOUR RELATIONSHIP WITH THESE ESOTERIC GROUPS OF
